data.name: Wonhon: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
ADD FULL GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1294340/Wonhon_A_Vengeful_Spirit/


About the Game

Wonhon: Prologue is a prequel chapter to the main game, a hardcore tactical stealth action thriller set in Korea in the beginning of 20th century.

Being returned from the dead, you have only one weapon: the ability to steal the life force from living creatures, turn into a ghost and possess them. Since you’re not protected by anything and can be killed with one shot, you need to move covertly and plan every step. The high complexity of the game makes you monitor each of your actions closely, since the punishment for being caught is a one-bullet death.



Play as a girl who can turn into a vengeful ghost to assassinate her enemies;



Conquer difficult situations when you are outnumbered and can be killed by one shot;



Balance between stealth and violence, finding your own unique way to complete your task;

data.short_description: Get a taste for vengeance in the Prologue for this hardcore tactical game. Use your paranormal abilities to possess your foes, slip past guards, and fight enemies, as you balance between stealth and action-based violence.
data.supported_languages: English, Korean, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable card, i.e. GTX 650 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is a work of fiction and should not be seen as realistic or historically accurate. Please treat this as an entertainment product.

This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed. Please make sure to seek proper guidance or counseling if any of the themes concern you.
